reviewText: Cluck like a chicken ... if you don't know then get this and be in the know

The plot for is simple: Unable to resist his animal urges, a professor is caught having sex with a coed.  Blackmailed, he must help his new partner-in-crime mentor -- the hottest females on campus -- and capture their erotic training sessions on film.

Shocking?  Scandalous?  Prurient?  Yes, and by design. Temptation is a genre of sexually explicit Japanese animation called "hentai."  In fact even the term "explicit" may be a bit misleading as these films include numerous, extended, graphic sex acts.

Remember, this is hand-drawn, stylized animation.  These aren't real people.  Strangely there's a warning at the beginning of these films that it features "no one under the age of 18."  I didn't know animated characters had a legal age.  For more information go to Anime18.com

This offbeat film is a satire of the porn industry. A previously overlooked movie (featuring Bridget the Midget!) features a prominent actress, tempting a porn starlet-cum-producer and her browbeaten, freaky husband. Will they go for the money, or remain true to their art? A quirky film with moments of brilliance, and several cameos from the porn industry. It's a film with heart and soul. I loved it!
Very crazy dialogue they put in these H Anime's. Bark like a Dog and Cluck like a Chicken!!!!

This was the very first hentai that I ever decided to buy on disc and I'm really glad I did!

Temptation has an overarching story of one of the teachers sticking it to a student and getting blackmailed by one of his superiors into having sex with other girls to help "break them in" the prostitute business. It's a pretty interesting premise and the scenes were very nicely dubbed in English which I was surprised by. The scenes themselves were also really nicely made and it was very hot to watch.

All in all I really enjoyed watching this, and would definitely recommend to anyone who enjoys hentai. :3
Just ok.  I still love Annette O'Toole in any movie just about.  She's gorgeous in a very understated way.

This Hentai has a good amount of scenes and doesn't destract from the sex . The plot is a basic blackmail plot witch is for the most part glossed over .The sex scenes aren't to fetishy except for one but over all not bad
